message_1: Suppose we have a message "HELLO" which we want to hash using the SHA-256 algorithm. What will be the resulting hash value in hexadecimal format?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash of the message "HELLO", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the Python code to compute the hash:

```python
import hashlib

message = "HELLO"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_hex = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_hex)
```

The resulting hash value in hexadecimal format is:
`2cf24dba5fb0a30e26e83b2ac5b9e29e1b161e5c1fa7425e73043362938b9824`
